column1: SVD : from S, V and U which one contains the right singular vector?
column2: Right singular vectors are stored in V

column1: SVD : from S, V and U which one contains the left singular vector?
column2: Left singular vectors are stored in U

column1: SVD : from S, V and U which one contains the singular values?
column2: S has singular values and is diagonal

column1: How to find the maximum contributor in a matrix?
column2: By running a SVD and choosing the highest value in the right singular vector --> use which.max(svd$v)
